info.name: Rainbowdash.net Widen + Enhance
info.description:
Widens the page to about 95% of your total browser (with a maximum width of 1300px), along with shrinking the popular notices. 
Works great with my 1280x800 resolution.
Has not been tested on larger, but even 1300px might be a bit too wide and become difficult to look at.
